unnormalised: Enjoyed the recent biography on P.T. Usha! The details about her training in Kerala and subsequent triumphs are inspiring. It's crucial to document these journeys. Maybe next, a deep dive into Sachin Tendulkar's early days or Dr. Devi Shetty's work promoting sports medicine. Consider athlete biographies from the North East. Imagine a feature on Mary Kom and her academy (5000 sq ft!). Costs about Rs. 10 Lakhs/year. More, please!
